titleStmt.title: A testimony against several prophane and superstitious customs now practised by some in New-England the evil whereof is evinced from the Holy Scriptures and from the writings both of ancient and modern divines / by Increase Mather.
titleStmt.author: Mather, Increase, 1639-1723.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
